pricing_request.subject: Viva Therapies - Pricing Information for {hotel_name}
pricing_request.body:
Dear {contact_name},

Thank you for your interest in Viva Therapies services for {hotel_name}.

As requested during our meeting, I'm pleased to provide you with our pricing information and service packages.

Our Services & Pricing:
• Massage Therapy: £80-120 per session
• Physiotherapy: £90-130 per session
• Personal Training: £70-100 per session
• Yoga Classes: £60-80 per session
• Osteopathy: £100-140 per session
• Wellness Programs: Custom pricing available

We offer flexible packages and volume discounts for hotels. All prices include:
- Certified, insured professionals
- All necessary equipment
- Flexible scheduling
- Guest satisfaction guarantee

I'd be happy to discuss a customized package that meets {hotel_name}'s specific needs and budget.

Please let me know when would be convenient for a follow-up call.

Best regards,
Oscar Martinez
Business Development Representative
Viva Therapies

Email: oscar@vivatherapies.com
